description: Subcomponent for `v-pie` that represents the tooltip displayed when hovering over chart segments.

props.item: Data item related to hovered segment
props.titleFormat: Formatter definition or function. When passed as String macros for `[title]` and `[value]` get replaced dynamically.
props.subtitleFormat: Formatter definition or function. When passed as String macros for `[title]` and `[value]` get replaced dynamically.
props.transition: The transition used when hovering between chart segments
